abstract: Mike Hale reviews Fox animated comedy series Allen Gregory, featuring the voice of Jonah Hill.
snippet: Fox’s new animated show, “Allen Gregory,” features Jonah Hill as the voice of the title character, a somewhat privileged 7-year-old horrified that he has to attend first grade in a public school.
lead_paragraph: Fox’s new animated show, “Allen Gregory,” features Jonah Hill as the voice of the title character, a somewhat privileged 7-year-old horrified that he has to attend first grade in a public school.

headline.main: A 7-Year-Old With a Very Developed Sense of Self
headline.print_headline: A 7-Year-Old With a Very Developed Sense of Self
headline.seo: ‘Allen Gregory,’ Jonah Hill’s New Fox Cartoon - Review
